description:
Description: Institutional brokerage seeks equity sales traders. Must have a minimum of three years equity sales trading and institutional execution experience. Should have an independent book of institutional agency business with strong buy-side relationships. Compensation and benefits.

Qualifications:
Qualifications: Should have an independent book of institutional agency business with strong buy-side relationships.

We are looking for extraordinary people with vision, self-motivation, marketing skills, and strong customer service orientation.

Biggest challenge is the ever changing business & regulatory environment.
